title: Smart Game-Based Learning System Design: Expert Course on Ontology Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic game design and understanding of educational systems, experience in mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: An online intensive workshop for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to acquire the competency to design smart game systems applicable to mathematical problem-solving

learning_goals: Extracting three or more SGBLS design requirements using ontology-based knowledge representation tools
Completing at least one game mechanism blueprint reflecting mathematical problem-solving scenarios
Applying semantic annotation techniques for learning data linkage to real-world cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
